description:
In search of the True History about Jeanne D`arc, Tokio and Calen arrive to Orléans, France. The encounter a thief as soon as they get there, but then a magical girl shows up. Huh? And she`s Jeanne D`arc? You`d think she`d use magic but instead she just hits the thief with her wand. Apparently she`s acting like a magical girl because of her boyfriend. Meanwhile, Akudarma shows up disguised as angels from Heaven and try to give Jeanne a sword, but...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Joan of Arc Was the First ______!
ジャンヌ・ダルクは初代○○だった!
